text: The Story of Asya Klyachina () is a 1966 Soviet drama movie directed by Andrei Konchalovsky.Чем запомнился сценарист и актер Юрий Клепиков?ИСТОРИЯ АСИ КЛЯЧКИНОЙ It stars Iya Savvina, Gennady Egorychev, and Alexander Surin. ==Actors== *Iya Savvina as Asya Klyachina *Gennady Egorychev as Chirkunov *Alexander Surin as Stepan *Mikhail Kislov *Ivan Petrov *Lyubov Sokolova as Maria, mother of Mishanka *Boris Parfyonov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian romance movies Category:1966 romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Andrei Konchalovsky Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet romance movies
title: The Story of Asya Klyachina
